verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: directed] [ARG1: the US Trade Representative 's office] [ARG2: to come up with another $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods to hit with tariffs , a move that would undoubtedly push the US and China into a full - blown trade war] .

President Donald Trump directed the US Trade Representative 's office to come up with another $ 200 billion worth of Chinese goods to hit with tariffs , a move that [V: would] undoubtedly push the US and China into a full - blown trade war .
